g.title: timer_and_reward_display
g.text: - Claim button visible only when claimable

g.title: reset_timer
g.text: - timer resets to session start duration

g.title: select_reward
g.text: - Set Duck Egg 1 or Set Duck Egg 2

g.title: select_reward_allowed_running_later
g.text: Allowed now, then timer starts later

g.title: claim_reward
g.text: - user must select a new reward
